author: adiasg
content:
Does `/eth/v1/validator/duties/proposer/{epoch}` return proposer duties for all validators in that epoch? To compare, `/eth/v1/validator/duties/attester/{epoch}` only return attestation duties for specific validator indices.
https://ethereum.github.io/beacon-APIs/#/ValidatorRequiredApi/getProposerDuties

author: ajsutton
content: Yes, because there are a small number of proposer duties per epoch they are all returned. For attester duties you need to specify which validators you want to get duties for and only those are returned.
